KrakowJS Conf

September 29 | Kraków

Kraków has always been missing a proper JavaScript conference. But here we are to the rescue!

Tickets
Speakers Agenda Location

Our great speakers

  • Artur Skowroński

    Developer with heart cracked between JS and JVM stacks (with more mature relationship and advanced marriage plans with JVM) and with fingers chopped from playing with bleeding edge technologies... hard way.

  • VLADIMIR ALEKSEICHENKO

    Vladimir likes traveling (visited about 30 countries)... also in the IT world. He worked in different areas in IT during last 10 years. He was involved in building infrastructure for Search Engine (TB's data), Big Data things. He participates in Kaggle's competitions. He loves (data) and challenges.

  • Konrad Dzwinel

    Konrad is a front-end developer at Brainly and a Google Developer Expert for Web Technologies. Passionate about developer tools, he built many of his own. The most popular include HTML&CSS extraction tool, SnappySnippet, and a web debugging proxy, Betwixt. Konrad is also a Chrome DevTools contributor and an international speaker.

  • This spot is waiting for you!

    If you want to become one our great speakers, please contact us at meetjskrk@gmail.com

You like the line-up? We're sure you do!

Organisers

Created for community, by the community.

This event is an effect of the cooperation of two community organizations - meet.js KRK, Woman In Technology and Woman Techmakers We have organised dozens of events throught the years. We highly believe that networking and knowledge sharing is essential for the IT communities to thrive.

See the photos to get the glipmse of what we do :)
